Keywords: Fantastic Four , Monster
Real Name: Bruce Banner
Special Powers
STRONGEST ONE THERE IS: Super Strength. When Hulk makes a close object attack, modify damage an additional +1. Protected: Outwit.
LEAPING SMASH: Leap/Climb. FREE: [Improved Movement: Elevated, Hindering]. Roll a d6. Move up to the result.

May 17, 2021
Goop
I would have rather him just had charge than that random movement ability. He's your average hulk who has high def in the front but weakens def increases attack as he get hit more. His damage also goes down. He's ok. Slightly better on his 50pt line.
July 26, 2020
Daunting Mountain
He is absolutely not "being placed." "Move up to the result" means move. You can Carry whenever you move. And since the d6 result is not a replacement value, the -1 speed modifier doesn't affect it.
July 26, 2020
cantcme
If the wording is correct of the power I think the Hulk can carry someone when he uses his FREE ability. It's very similar to Sidestep except he could move more squares possibly.

No because he isn't moving. He's being placed.

July 23, 2020
BLsquared
I actually prefer this Hulk to the main set one for a New Fantastic Four team. The free movement, traited super strength, starting Invincible, and the more consistent stats make me want to use this one more. Plus, he has the Underworld TA, which lets him carry his buddies just like the other one. I'd probably have to try both on a team, but I'd try this one first for that team specifically.
